description: This file is a C header defining internal (private) interfaces and macros for the OVSDB (Open vSwitch Database) subsystem related to the 'ovsdb_priv.h'. It contains macro definitions, external function declarations, and include directives necessary for internal components of the OVSDB module.

methods.name: ovsdb_jsonrpc_id_new
methods.description: Returns a new JSON-RPC ID, likely used to uniquely identify JSON-RPC calls within the OVSDB module.

methods.name: ovsdb_tran_comment
methods.description: Inserts a comment into an OVSDB transaction; used for adding annotation or metadata into the transaction JSON.

methods.name: ovsdb_tran_operation
methods.description: Generates and returns a JSON object representing a transaction operation, given a transaction context.
